name: Danny's Debt is Eternal
description:
LarsMidnatt is back with another unique and quirky experience full of personality!

Danny's Debt is Eternal is a short, humorous adult game with fantastical H-scenes and plenty of eye candy. By completing goals given to you by the Curator, you can unlock an image gallery with over 100 images. Even the save screen is smutty, so be prepared!

Danny is indebted to Taenya Leovyre, an elvish princess. He is ordered to work as a brothel matchmaker to pay her back, a tedious task. Fortunately, job benefits include hooking up with fantastical women and an endless supply of wine. Pick the best pairings to earn the most credits to buy Taenya new outfits and enjoy her updated looks. Each outfit also unlocks an H-scene when equipped!

Cecile Shimmerlily, Taenya's faye servant, will help Danny learn new skills to make his job more manageable. She may look small, but she's got big connections that can make Danny's life easier. Be sure to visit her and her friends for the best experience.

Danny is in a bind, help him replay the princess, and see how well he is rewarded!

All characters are 18 years or older.
